name: Old Faithful Inn Dining Room
description: Located within Yellowstone National Park itself, this historic dining room offers a variety of hearty meals with a view of the iconic Old Faithful geyser.

name: Mammoth Hot Springs Dining Room
description: Another option within Yellowstone, this dining room serves up classic American fare with stunning views of the Mammoth Hot Springs terraces.

name: El Tovar Dining Room
description: Located within the historic El Tovar Hotel on the South Rim of the Grand Canyon, this restaurant offers a fine dining experience with breathtaking views of the canyon. Serving up a menu that blends Southwestern and contemporary cuisine, it's a great choice for visitors looking for a memorable dining experience amidst the stunning natural beauty of the Grand Canyon.

name: Roosevelt Lodge Dining Room
description: Situated near the Tower-Roosevelt area of the park, this rustic dining room offers a cozy atmosphere and hearty Western cuisine.
